[h1]You will probably play terribly at first, but CSGO is fun with friends.[/h1]
Coming from other shooters, it takes a long time to adjust to Counter Strike's gunplay and get good (I'm still not great). I have the most fun playing with friends because competitive lobbies can be super toxic.
